name: protoproto
description: You have a field of wood logs that you can effect with fire, ice, water, acid, electricity, mud, plants, ghosts, bugs, and literal magic, along with just breaking them with tools. You can also pickup and build with broken blocks, to make little proto-houses or set up elemental contraptions or experiments, or just write out an angry worded letter to your congressman about how he's sold everyone out for a box of donuts and hush money to pay for his abortion.  It's all up to you, real basic stuff, it will prolly crash, there's no goal or game, just mechanics to mess around with. If you do play it, I would love to hear any thoughts about what you thought, but yeah, have fun
